data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aarvik, Leif, Agassiz, David J. L. (2014): Revision of African Neaspasia Diakonoff, 1989 and the related Conaspasia, n. gen. (Lepidoptera, Tortricidae). Zootaxa 3754 (2): 117-132, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.2.2
